name: 魔帝1 Magic Emperor1
description:
The game has had 400,000 hits and 20,000 player retweets and favorites, now it's on steam!!

【 Introduction to the story 】
The peak of power is always accompanied by bloodshed.
From this day on...
You've gone from the peak of your power to the lowest point...
From a supreme queen to a common man...
Where does your heroine go from here...
Your heroine will travel to another world!
Be the master queen of total attack! Has an attractive peach blossom constitution?
Become the harem men's pet! ?
To ascend the throne? Peach blossoms in harem? Start a life surrounded by beautiful men?
No, no, no!
Only to find that the original thing is not so simple!


【 details Introduction to the story 】
At birth, the heroine [Nie Le] was cultivated and protected as the female emperor of his culture.
【I thought I could lead my life by hanging Goldfinger all the way, but I never thought that Goldfinger didn't exist.】

Later, he naturally became the demon Lord of the world, but it is a pity that he is only a half-wit female emperor.

Born in the moon, unwilling to fate of the chief male pet [Pan Fufeng] intended to approach [Nie Le]
Demon world hegemony is contested, [Nie Le] by the strength is strong, ruthless but romantic beautiful [Nie Yuntian] to seize the position.
Have been cut.

In the time of life and death, lucky by the mysterious return sunshine boy [huan ruen] to save.
In the days of recuperation, I met my own guardian snail,
From then on, I was forced to set foot on... A journey to clean up the mess of the Enchanted Palace.
Encounter was the king of the world [you don't say] cruel revenge.
Road in the past deliberately imprisoned under the name of Xiuxian husband 【 Wuqingren 】

Destroyed two big men [Nie Yun Tian] and [Pan Fufeng].
Take back his kingdom and his kingdom.
Take back his control of the free world!
Can waste chai [Nie Le] defy the enemy and become a real female emperor?
All...... The unknown...

【Highlights of the game】
1. Exclusive customized male master painting, girls must face!
2. Exquisitely customized CG scene, girl heart full.
3. Simple gameplay, good news for plot lovers and easy to play for lazy people. You can watch the plot with a click of the mouse without complicated cultivation.
4. Reverse the plot with multiple branches. The story is interesting. Agitation style, love and hatred, sincere feelings.


【Fan communication group of Steam Emperor】
If you like this game, welcome to join the fan exchange QQ group: 855541897
There will be irregular welfare activities within the group

【YIMI GAME Messages】
Thank you for your support for the Magic Emperor series!
I hope this story can bring you positive energy and happiness!
Thank you for your support of YIMI GAME!
